subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: When the monsoon stops, the star of the Open at Bethpage will be the Black course, a fearsome being even when industrial-size squeegees are not being employed on the greens.
snippet: When the monsoon stops, the star of the Open at Bethpage will be the Black course, a fearsome being even when industrial-size squeegees are not being employed on the greens.
